TopicTitle: Suggestion: Make Items officially able to "double joint"

Articles.Content:
Hey,

as you can see on the picture, the trusses got attached TWO X, even while symmetriemode is on ONE PART Only.

I believe that the fact that there is 2 crew cabines aboard makes the thing TRYING to double joint each part of it. As if we try to attach like 8 crew cabines in a circle, and the last one has to tight junkt the whole circle of cabines, right?
